str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I call, summon, invite, (b) I call, name. Akin to the base of keleuo; to 'call'.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: Strengthened for a primary edo; used only in certain tenses, the rest being supplied by phago; to eat.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: From para and tithemi; to place alongside, i.e. Present; by implication, to deposit.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From ana and krino; properly, to scrutinize, i.e. investigate, interrogate, determine.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
The conscience, a persisting notion. From a prolonged form of suneido; co-perception, i.e. Moral consciousness.
